title: January Early Sales
body: Does anyone know when early sales for this month is going to start? I thought it would be today since its usually the weekend before the last week in the month which is this week.

replies.body: I don't have any info on sales or upcoming ones until they've been announced.  Bookmark our [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) page in the meantime in case anything comes up.  Fingers crossed from some good deals!
